name: Patryk Zaslawski
role_name: Mid-Level Django Backend Developer with DevOps Experience
profile_summary: As a Mid-Level Django Backend Developer with DevOps Experience, I bring 8+ years of software engineering expertise focused on designing and implementing high-performance backend solutions. Proficient in **Django**, **Python**, and **REST API** development, I ensure seamless integration and robust performance for applications. My technical repertoire also includes **PostgreSQL** and **MySQL** for database management, and I leverage **CI/CD** methodologies, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes** for efficient deployment and orchestration. Skilled in cloud environments such as **AWS** and **Azure**, along with infrastructure as code using **Terraform** and **Ansible**, I enhance system reliability and scalability. Additionally, I possess foundational knowledge in **Linux** and version control with **Git**. My strengths include a keen problem-solving ability, adapting to new technologies swiftly, and a commitment to delivering high-quality, secure applications that align with business objectives.
